items.name: Bonzo Finance
items.description: Bonzo Finance is an open source, non-custodial lending & borrowing protocol on Hedera.

items.name: Dovu

items.name: Envision Blockchain
items.description: The Guardian is an innovative open-source platform that streamlines the creation, management, and verification of digital environmental assets. It leverages a customizable Policy Workflow Engine and Web3 technology to ensure transparent and fraud-proof operations, making  it a key tool for transforming sustainability practices and carbon markets.
